properties.displayName: Use File Path for Input Image
properties.name: inputUseFilePath
properties.description: Use a file path for the input image. Uncheck to use binary data from a previous node.

properties.name: inputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to the source image to be edited.

properties.name: inputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name of the binary property from a previous node containing the input image.

properties.name: prompt
properties.default: make him wear a tank top
properties.placeholder: Describe the edit you want to make...
properties.description: The instructions for how to edit the image.

properties.name: batchSize
properties.description: The number of images to generate.

properties.name: outputAsFilePath
properties.description: Whether to save the output to a specified file path. Uncheck to output as binary data.

properties.name: outputFilePath
properties.description: The full file path to save the output image.

properties.name: outputBinaryPropertyName
properties.description: The name to give the output binary property.
